data.title: Sitmar Cruises Fairsky 1978-1979 Pacific Cruises Brochure
data.meta_description: Rare 32 page brochure for the Sitmar Cruises TSS Fairsky's planned 1978-1979 cruises which were all canceled after the ship suffered extensive hull damage in mid-1977.Â  This 1st edition brochure was printed in April 1977 and the ship suffered serious hull damage in June 1977 when it hit a submerged wreck near Jakarta a
data.text:
Product Description

Rare 32 page brochure for the Sitmar Cruises TSS Fairsky's planned 1978-1979 cruises which were all canceled after the ship suffered extensive hull damage in mid-1977.

This 1st edition brochure was printed in April 1977 and the ship suffered serious hull damage in June 1977 when it hit a submerged wreck near Jakarta and Sitmar decided not to repair the ship due to the extensive hull damage. Sitmar sold the ship to a Philippine company in 1978 which planned to turn it into a hotel but it was gutted by fire in Manila bay in 1979 and towed to Hong Kong to be scrapped.

The brochure includes a photo of the ship on the front cover and inside back cover, cruise itineraries for the planned 1978-79 Pacific cruises, room rates, and general information. (no deck plans).

Excellent condition.
